visual.name: Business performance planning - Comment
visual.description: Business performance planning - Comment visual enables users to enter text with rich text formatting options directly from Power BI taking into account the active filter context. Supported by a comprehensive editor with a variety of formatting options users can write back text into Business performance planning SQL database tables. Business performance planning - Comment takes into account and stores formatted text based on Power BI filter criteria that can be setup at the detail required in the Business performance planning app.
